title: U.S. soccer players abroad: Josh Sargent scores in Werder Bremen’s draw
text:
Newcastle United defender DeAndre Yedlin: played 90

description: Matt Miazga posts late match-winner for Reading and Sergiño Dest assists twice for Ajax.
